summary:
Experienced professional with a demonstrated history of working in the oil & energy industry. Skilled in Analytical Skills, SAP ERP, Teamwork, Financial Analysis, and Financial Reporting. Strong research professional with a Master's degree focused in International Relations and Affairs from Corvinus University of Budapest.

Computer skills and competences: Microsoft Office, Internet, SAP, ERP systems, SUN, IDEAS, Lotus Notes, Sharp, Sharepoint

Other skills and competences: Financial Controlling, Continuous Improvement, Financial Analysis and Reporting, Accounting, Presentations, Business Continuity Planning, Record Management, First Aider, Ergo Specialist, Gas and Oil Industry – Upstream / Downstream, Intercompany Accounts, Bank Accounts, SAP Access Control, Journal Voucher workflow monitoring.

profile_positions.description:
lntercompany Accounting

Perform monthly lC Reconciliation and Aging of assigned relationships, including follow up,
researching and resolving reconciling items.
Prepare and post monthly journal entries, execute lC settlements and clearing.
Assist EMEA lntercompany Manager in monitoring and reviewing monthly intercompany activities
performed by our external shared services firm.
Be subject matter expert in lntercompany processes. Respond to stakeholders' queries regarding
lntercompany policy and processes.

Cash/FX Accounting

Oversee bank reconciliation process performed by external shared services firm.
Check and verify cash transactions, investigate and propose possible resolution for any discrepancies
or items in suspense.
Responsible for following up on financial postings and ensuring assigned tasks are completed on
schedule per the close tool.
Work to improve controlling processes and its adherence to month end deadlines.
Work with Cash/FX Manager to develop effective and efficient enhancements to the cash
reconciliation and management process. This includes weekly review of cash postings, follow-up
emails on receipts that are not coded.
Perform month-end close processes and assists with financial reporting and analysis.

Stakeholder Management / Partnering Support / Process lmprovement

Continuous monitoring of work performed by 3rd party service provider across LER2R activities
Perform ad-hoc requests (audit requests, presentation slides, journal entries, etc.) as needed and
prioritize together with other ongoing priorities.
Support LER2R's continuous improvement in the efficiency and effectiveness of accounting processes
and financial reporting.
Maintain a basic understanding of financial systems and data elements related to assigned accounting
processes.
Demonstrate keen interest in process improvement initiatives which may include system testing
and validation.

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.description: Responsibility to for implement and monitor financial and operational controls, create procedures and provide guidelines on compliance with SOX (Sarbanes-Oxley), US GAAP and ExxonMobil’s corporate requirements and in-country requirements in the Business Service Center (BSC). Manage and lead process migrations between BSCs (in Budapest and other locations) and in-country businesses within company globally and support global harmonization of processes and  controls within the BSCs. Support internal control reviews (internal audit and external audit), evaluate risks and advise and implement mitigating actions in business processes in order to improve effectiveness of financial and operational controls in the BSC. Support process improvements and implement best practices to ensure effectiveness within  BSC’s globally. Perform internal control reviews to ensure effective and efficient operations globally in accordance with ExxonMobil Unit Internal Audit Methodology. Demonstrate in-depth understanding of the overall control environment, ensure accuracy of financial reporting and compliance with laws and regulations (SOX , US GAAP and ExxonMobil’s corporate requirements and in-country requirements). Perform system access administration and support for SAP (ERP, SHARP) in-house accounting and reporting systems. Design and configure control reports and system accesses for business roles. Ensure compliance of control reports and workflow monitoring. Perform monthly key performance indicators (KPIs) reporting for all BSC supported business functions. Analyse monthly KPIs. Coordinate and performing yearly global access reviews, supporting external and internal audit reviews across global organizations. Provide system access for users to ensure proper segregation of duties in line with user roles and responsibilities. Coordinate projects with process improvement leveraging new technologies, automation of daily, weekly and yearly control reports.
